1.name: Sweep the Leg
1.short_description: Japanese Rice Lager with NZ hops add a subtle tropical, coconut, hop character

2.name: Thrills for Pils
2.description: Clean, simple malt flavor with an assertive and dry bitterness.
2.short_description: Northern German Pilsner with a clean, simple malt flavor with an assertive bitterness and spicy, floral hop character.

3.name: Let's Play!
3.description: Light, dry, easy drinking with a mild hoppy aroma
3.short_description: Light, dry, easy drinking with a mild hoppy aroma

4.name: I'm Not a Hazy, I Just Crush a Lot
4.description: Classic hops give this beer wonderful citrus, floral, and pine hop flavors and aromas.
4.short_description: All the awesome old school hops giving citrus, floral, and mild piney notes with a dry finish and mild bitterness

5.name: Pixelated Pale
5.short_description: Punchy, tropical fruit up front with a modest bitterness and crisp malt finish

6.name: Game On!
6.short_description: Mild maltiness, big juicy hop aroma, and lots of punchy hop flavor.

8.name: The Baddest Dude in the Room
8.short_description: Full bodied IPA with notes of pine and citrus

9.name: Bump and Rind
9.short_description: Azacca, Galaxy, Idaho 7 and Sabro hops

10.name: Other Rappers Diss Me
10.short_description: Tropical and juicy hop character in a well balanced Hazy IPA

11.name: Rising Hope IPA
11.short_description: IPA with Passionfruit, Orange, and Guava puree - Benefiting the National Pediatric Cancer Foundation

12.name: Brave Noise
12.short_description: Citrus and tropical fruit notes. All proceeds from this beer will be donated to the Women's Foundation of Oregon

13.name: Ready Player One
13.short_description: Brewerâ€™s lawnmower beer. Light, flavorful and crisp.

14.name: Simply Citrus
14.description: This is not your normal Belgian Witbier (White Beer). This beer is a cross between two loves, Belgian Wheat Ale and American Hazy Pale Ale. Fermented warm with our farmhouse yeast, spiced, brewed and dry hopped with Loral, Strata, and Mandarina Bavaria. Only at 4.9% this crushable "White Pale Ale" is Off-dry, hazy, hop forward citrus bomb exploding with aromas of Sweet Orange, Lemon, Peach, and Toasted Coriander Spice.
14.short_description: Sweet Orange, Toasted Coriander Spice, Lemon,  Peachy Dank

15.name: I'd Like to Speak to the Manager
15.description: A Beer for the Karens of the world, but we made it taste good for everyone! A delicious English Brown Ale base beer with lactose sugar, pumpkin, coffee, and reasonably spiced with pumpkin pie spices (vanilla, ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, cloves). This seasonal ale is sure to please those looking for a tasty fall treat.
15.short_description: Pumpkin Latte Ale with lactose, coffee, and pumpkin pie spices
15.appearance: Coffee Brown with a tan head
15.malts: Marris Otter base, crystal, brown, chocolate

16.name: Biscuits to a Bear
16.description: A malt-foreword English style pale ale designed to be your daily beer. Lovely biscuit, bread crust malt flavors and aromas, a little sweetness, mildly hopped with a well-balanced bitterness and mild herbal, floral hop character. This beer is lower in alcohol so you can have a couple, and you will want to because this beer is delicious!
16.short_description: Lovely biscuit, bread crust malt flavors and aromas, a little sweetness, mildly hopped with a well-balanced bitterness and mild herbal, floral hop character
16.appearance: Orange/ Copper color, clear, off-white head.
16.malts: Heritage Maris Otter, Amber Malt, Crystal

17.name: Galaxy SMASH
17.description: Big notes of passion fruit, peach, and citrus from 100% Galaxy hops.
17.short_description: Big notes of passion fruit, peach, and citrus from 100% Galaxy hops.

19.name: Funk Weapon
19.description: Stainless fermented mixed culture saison dry hopped with Motueka and Nelson
19.short_description: Delicate funk nose, straw/farmhouse body complimented by a pine/grass hop aroma and flavor

20.name: Gimli
20.short_description: Big roasty flavors with notes of chocolate that finishes dry on the palate
